channel.title: How can i edit my capes requirement?
channel.description: i made a new skill but lol...for a senior i feel dumb asking, how do i make it so you cant wear a cape without 99 of a level? the new skill isnt defence or w/e its skill [22] if that helps anybody :P

item.title: How can i edit my capes requirement?
item.dc:creator: @mod_abyssal mod abyssal
item.description:
@mod_abyssal wrote:

thank you lothy, i was about to ask for that :D[br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2007, 09:23:32 PM[/size][hr]Heres the code (so far…) it doesnt require 99 of skill [22] for some reason still if(playerEquipment[playerCape] == 1052 && playerLevel[22] >= 99) { stillgfx(84, absY, absX); }– this is under public boolean process

edit: the GFX works fine when its removed or put on but still, the requirement of skill 22 is needed

Read full topic
item.source: How can i edit my capes requirement?
